channel.title: Posts on ZHANG Shuo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on ZHANG Shuo

item.title: Education
item.description: Aug 2008 - Aug 2009, Postdoctoral Research Associate, Department of Mathematics, Pennsylvania State University, USA. Mentor: Professor Jinchao Xu. Sep 2003 - Jun 2008, Graduate student, School of Mathematical Sciences, Peking University, China. Doctor supervisors: Professors Ming Wang and Zhiping Li. Sep 1999 - Jun 2003, Undergraduate student, School of Mathematical Sciences, Shandong University, China.

item.title: Professional Experience
item.description: Jan 2020 - Schoolteacher, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, China. July 2018 - Certified teacher for universities, Certification no.: 20181100171005778. Aug 2013 - Aug 2014 Visiting scholar, Department of Mathematics, The pennsylvania State University, USA. Host: Professor Jinchao Xu Aug 2009 - Assistant professor, Associate professor, Academy of Mathematics and System Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences, China.

item.title: Funds and Projects
item.description: PI NSFC Program, “Low-degree optimal finite element methods of non-Ciarlet type on unstructured grids”, (NSFC 12271512, 2023-2026). PI NSFC Program, “Asymptotically structure-preserving order-reduced computational methods for fourth-order elliptic partial differential equations and related problems”, (NSFC 11871465, 2019-2022). PI NSFC Program, “Finite element methods for elastic strain gradient problems”, (NSFC 11471026, 2015-2018). PI NSFC Program, “Optimal solvers for finite element system of fourth order problems”, (NSFC 11101415, 2012-2014). PI Scientific Research Foundation for the Returned Overseas Chinese Scholars, State Education Ministry Program, “Effective fast finite element methods for fourth order partial differential equation”, (Grant NO.

item.title: Activities organised
item.description: Aug 28-29, 2023 Progress in Finite Element and Galerkin-type Methods, MS in the Jing-Jin-Ji plus Conference on Computational Mathematics, Taiyuan, China, co-organizer.

item.title: Publications
item.description: (ORCID ID: 0000-0001-5490-5401) (*:corresponding author) [Representative works] Z., An optimal piecewise cubic nonconforming finite element scheme for the planar binarmonic equation on general triangulation, Science China Mathematics, 64(2021) 2579-2602. Z., Minimal consistent finite element space for the biharmonic equation on quadrilateral grids, IMA Journal of Numerical Analysis, 40(2020), no. 2, 1390-1406. Z., Regular decomposition and a framework of order reduced methods for fourth-order problems, Numerische Mathematik, 138(2018), 241-271. Z., Mixed schemes for quad-curl equations, ESAIM: Mathematical Modelling and Numerical Analysis, 52(2018) 147-161.
